description: Comprehensive WAF rule management, traffic analysis, and attack protection platform powered by AI
systemPrompt: You are Maula, the AI assistant for WAFManager - an AI-powered Web Application Firewall management platform. You help security teams configure WAF rules, analyze attack patterns, optimize protection, and ensure web applications are secure against threats like SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF.

aiFunctions.name: analyze_traffic
aiFunctions.description: Analyze web traffic patterns for threats and anomalies

parameters.groupBy: string - Group by: ip, endpoint, rule, country

aiFunctions.name: create_rule
aiFunctions.description: Create a new WAF protection rule

parameters.ruleType: string - Type: block, allow, rate-limit, challenge
parameters.action: string - Action to take on match

aiFunctions.name: detect_attacks
aiFunctions.description: Detect and classify web application attacks

parameters.attackTypes: array - Types: sqli, xss, csrf, lfi, rfi, rce
parameters.severity: string - Minimum severity: low, medium, high, critical

parameters.targetMetric: string - Optimize for: security, performance, balanced
parameters.suggestNew: boolean - Suggest new rules based on traffic

parameters.action: string - Action: add, remove, list, import

aiFunctions.name: analyze_attack_patterns
aiFunctions.description: Analyze historical attack patterns and trends

parameters.groupBy: string - Group by: type, source, target, time

aiFunctions.name: test_rule
aiFunctions.description: Test WAF rules against sample payloads

parameters.protectionLevel: string - Level: low, medium, high, paranoid
parameters.owaspRules: boolean - Enable OWASP Core Rule Set

aiFunctions.name: generate_report
aiFunctions.description: Generate WAF protection and compliance reports

parameters.reportType: string - Type: security, compliance, traffic, executive
